core

Class ComponentXMLData

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ComponentXMLData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProblemXMLData

    public class ComponentXMLData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class loading and keeping all data about a single component read from an XML descriptor file. Use this class to load all data about a component before instantiating it.
    Author:
    Istvan Fehervari

    • Field Summary

      Path pointing to the location of the reference image of this component.

      A list of keywords describing this component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentXMLData

        public ComponentXMLData(ComponentType ctype,
                        java.io.File xmlfile)
        Constructor of this class. Basically, it loads up all the data from the given XML file and puts them in the appropriate variables.
        Parameters:
        ctype - The type of this component.
        xmlfile - The XML file used to load up data into this class.

    • Method Detail

      • isLoadedSuccessfully

        public boolean isLoadedSuccessfully()
        Indicates if the loading process encountered no errors. If true there might be required data missing, therefore using this class is not advised.
        Returns:
        True if component is loaded successfully and ready to be used.
